values: 观点；看法；意见；想法；方式；方法；视野；视线；视域；视图；景观；展望；审视；态度；检查；观察；观看；（从某处看到的）景色；风景
看；观看；查看；审视；观察；仔细观察；看待；考虑；视为；把…视为；以…看待；认为；估量；评估；预览；预看；目睹；目击

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 无景色的；无意见的；看不见的
观察者；观看者；电视观众；[仪] 指示器

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指正式提出来供研究、采纳或实行的建议。
指在自己经历的基础上而提出的有益建议、意见或忠告。
普通用词，语气比advice婉转客气，也不如proposal正式。着重为改进工作、解决困难等提出的建议，有时含所提建议不一定正确，仅供参考的意味。
日常用词，泛指对某事物的想法和意见。
侧重指对重大的或引起公众关注的问题所持的看法和态度。
普通用词，侧重依据个人经验、学识和正确判断而提出的忠言。
侧重指旅游观光的风光，包括城市景色或自然风光景色。也指人造景物或奇特的景色。
指具体的、局部的或一时的景色，可以是自然形成的，也可人工造成的。
指一个国家或某一地区的整体自然风景。
普通和词，多指从远处或高处所见的景色。
多指在内陆的自然风光。
着重指基于情感而非推理所得出的，已经固定了的看法，常用复数形式。
普通用词，通常指凭感觉和想象所形成的看法或意见。
普通用词，使用广泛。多指初步的或缺证据支持因而不十分肯定的意见或看法。
侧重指个人对较广泛或重大问题所持的看法，常用复数形式。

word_group.brief_definition: 观点, 看法, 态度；观察点, 叙事角度, 观察位置
陈列, 展出；易看见的, 显眼的
看得见的；作为目标；考虑
侧视图；侧面图；侧面形状

word_group.phrase: distance lends enchantment to the view

bilingual.source: A scientist gave her view on the new proposal.
bilingual.target: 一位科学家发表了她对新提案的看法。

bilingual.source: I do not agree with his view.

bilingual.target: 我们对他的看法不以为然。
他的主张改变了我的看法。

bilingual.source: He has a narrow view of the world.
bilingual.target: 他对世界有一个狭窄的看法。

bilingual.source: Your view on this issue is right on.
bilingual.target: 你对这个问题的看法好极了。

bilingual.source: He has a pessimistic view of the future.
bilingual.target: 他对未来持有悲观的看法。

bilingual.source: She has a cynical view of politics.
bilingual.target: 她对政治持有愤世嫉俗的看法。

list.abstract: View（英 [vjuː]，美 [vjuː]），英语单词，作名词时，为视力；视野；视线。作动词时，为观看；查看；看待。短语搭配有in one's view（在某人看来）。例句为“I lean toward the latter view.（我倾向于后一种观点。）” View名词类近义词有observation、opinion、scenery等，及物动词类近义词有watch、study、regard等。View同根词有viewing、viewable、viewer。
SHINee正规4辑《Odd》主打歌《View》，成员金钟铉作词，在第四次巡回演唱会上首次公开，MV于2015.5.19公开。

yingyinNormal.en: Arnold always held a somewhat dim view of people. He preferred the hosts. He begged me to not let you people in, the moneymen. Delos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿诺德总是对人类抱有一些阴暗的看法，他更喜欢接待员，他求我不要引入你们这些人，那些投资者，像提洛岛一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. I'm liking this new view.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，我喜欢这新景色。

yingyinNormal.en: For the opposing view, Mr. Baum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反面观点，鲍姆先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Kind of a bleak view. Yes, that is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 观点有点凄凉啊。是的，事实如此。

yingyinNormal.en: Our last ocean view room was unacceptable to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只剩一间观海房，可是你们不喜欢。

yingyinNormal.en: Must've been a spectacular view. She's quite a girl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上面的景色一定特别美妙。她是个好姑娘。

yingyinNormal.en: He was within my view from approximately 6:55 to 7:45.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他一直在我视线内，大概6:55到7:45之间都在。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a garden view room, and we paid for an ocean view room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这间房是花园景观，我们订的是观海房。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll have a fantastic view when we get to the top. We are here. Hurray. Look at the lovely sunny view. Oh, dear. It is started to rain. Where is the lovely view?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等我们到了山顶之后风景一定很美。我们到了。太好了！看这怡人的阳光，明媚的景色！噢，糟糕。突然下雨了。美丽的景色到哪里去了？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God. Was she old? Does she have a view?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，她很老吗？她的公寓景观好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And the higher I got, the more amazed I was by the view.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我发现爬得越高，眼前的景象便愈发迷人。

yingyinNormal.en: No. But you know what? I think I need a male point of view.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还没，我决定问男性的意见。

yingyinNormal.en: But think of it for a minute from the wheat's point of view.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是站在小麦的角度再想想看。

yingyinNormal.en: I hope you don't mind. The view can be distracting. I hadn't noticed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 希望您别介意，外面的景色会让人分心。我完全没注意。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're waiving your right to keep the video from public view? I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是要放弃对大众保密的权利吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: How can you be talking about the view when I remembered my family? No!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想起我的家人，你怎么还在讲风景？不!

yingyinNormal.en: The view. Well, you have a good time! All by yourself. Not getting lost.
yingyinNormal.zh: 风景，那就玩得开心啊。自己一个，别迷路罗！

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy pig, you're not paddling. Sorry, Daddy pig, I was just enjoying the view.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈，你没有在踩它吗？对不起，猪爸爸，我只顾欣赏景色了。

yingyinNormal.en: I came to view problems like puzzles that would reward me if I could solve them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我转而把问题看成谜题能解决谜题就可获得奖励。

yingyinNormal.en: I can hold more than one point of view in my mind. I am mature. I don't believe you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的思想兼容并包，我足够成熟。我才不信你。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看法; 观点; 思考; 考虑
认为; 看待; 视为
看; 望; 观察; 察看
角度; 视野; 视线; 看; 观看

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 观点；看法；态度；观察点；叙事角度；观察位置

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 察看者；观看者；参观者；看片器；观众
n. 察看；观看；收看；亲眼目睹的机会

word_family.mean: n. 视力；视野；视线；看法；意见；想法；观点；视图；景色；图像

sense_info_list.zh: 看法; 观点; 思考; 考虑

examination_example.sentence: Remind the person that this is your point of <highlight>view</highlight>, and then invite critique.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提醒对方这是你的观点，然后邀请评论。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>views</highlight> of arguments also undermine reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些观点的争论也破坏了理性。

examination_example.sentence: This long perspective makes the pessimistic <highlight>view</highlight> of our prospects seem more likely to be a passing fad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种长视角使得对我们前景的悲观看法似乎更有可能是一时的流行。

sense_info_list.en: have a particular opinion or way of thinking
sense_info_list.zh: 认为; 看待; 视为

examination_example.sentence: HGTV has seriously changed how people <highlight>view</highlight> real estate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: HGTV已经严重改变了人们对房地产的看法。

examination_example.sentence: Though often <highlight>viewed</highlight> as a problem for western states, the growing frequency of wildfires is a national concern.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然经常被认为是西方国家的问题，但日益频繁的野火是一个国际性的问题。

examination_example.sentence: A small but vocal group of Hawaiians and environmentalists have long <highlight>viewed</highlight> their presence as disrespect for sacred land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一小群夏威夷人和环保主义者一直认为他们的存在是对圣地的不尊重。

sense_info_list.zh: 看; 望; 观察; 察看

examination_example.sentence: Why did the Victorians start to <highlight>view</highlight> photographs?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么维多利亚时代的人开始看照片？

examination_example.sentence: Participants were encouraged to predict how they would feel after <highlight>viewing</highlight> an unpleasant picture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参与者被鼓励预测他们在看到不愉快的图片后的感受。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Viewing</highlight> a fast-food logo for just a few milliseconds primes us to read 20 percent faster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 注视快餐标志仅几毫秒，可以让我们的阅读速度提高20%。

sense_info_list.zh: 角度; 视野; 视线; 看; 观看

examination_example.sentence: The sun behind a cloud can be temporarily hidden from <highlight>view</highlight>, but it's capable of being restored in an instant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 云后的太阳可能暂时会被遮挡住视线，但它可以在瞬间恢复。

examination_example.sentence: But take a longer <highlight>view</highlight> and there is a surprising amount that we can say with considerable assurance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是从更长远的角度来看，我们可以相当有把握地说，有一个惊人的数量。

sense_info_list.en: a sight or prospect, typically of attractive natural scenery, that can be taken in by the eye from a particular place

word_usage.usage: view指个人对某事物的观点或态度，常可与 opinion 换用；comment对某人或某事物所发表的意见、见解。
view作名词指“对……的看法；意见；见解”可以说view on sth.也可以说view about sth.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“景色”，指眼睛视力范围内的景色。
意为“景色”，为可数名词，指部分景色，眼前的景色，常指动景，常带有美学和戏剧的含义，如道具、布景。
意为“景色”、“风景”，指全部景色，为不可数名词，常指自然景色或画出的风景，如舞台布景。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看; 望; 观察; 察看
(从某处看到的)景色; (尤指)乡间美景

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 观点；看法；态度；观察点；叙事角度；观察位置

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 察看者；观看者；参观者；看片器；观众

word_family.mean: n. 视力；视野；视线；看法；意见；想法；观点；视图；景色；图像

sense_info_list.en: an opinion, belief, or idea, or a way of thinking about something

examination_example.sentence: In my <highlight>view</highlight>, overprotection and too much care are not beneficial to children's development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，过度保护和过多的关心对孩子的发展是不利的。

examination_example.sentence: It was conducted from frontline managers' point of <highlight>view</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是从一线经理的角度进行的。

examination_example.sentence: They can air their <highlight>views</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以发表意见。

sense_info_list.en: have a particular opinion or way of thinking

examination_example.sentence: It was <highlight>viewed</highlight> as a means to quest for knowledge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它被视为寻求知识的一种手段。

examination_example.sentence: What kind of leaders are <highlight>viewed</highlight> as ethical by entitled employees?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 什么样的领导者会被符合资格的员工认为是有道德的？

examination_example.sentence: Companies, which have long <highlight>viewed</highlight> batteries and alternative forms of energy as a threat, are learning to embrace the technologies as enabling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使是长期以来视电池和替代能源为威胁的公司也正试着接受这些技术，将其视为促进。

sense_info_list.zh: 看; 望; 观察; 察看

examination_example.sentence: However, parents shouldn't completely constrain children's <highlight>viewing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，父母不应该完全限制孩子观看。

sense_info_list.en: the visual appearance or an image of something when looked at in a particular way
a sight or prospect, typically of attractive natural scenery, that can be taken in by the eye from a particular place
sense_info_list.zh: (从某处看到的)景色; (尤指)乡间美景

sense_info_list.en: a particular way of considering or regarding something

examination_example.sentence: For the first time in my life, I have a clear-eyed <highlight>view</highlight> of myself that is authentic, compassionate and accepting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人生中首次我对自己有了一个清晰的认识：真实、富有同情心和乐于接受。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看; 望; 观察; 察看
景色; 风景; (尤指)乡间美景

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 察看者；观看者；参观者；看片器；观众
n. 察看；观看；收看；亲眼目睹的机会

word_family.mean: n. 视力；视野；视线；看法；意见；想法；观点；视图；景色；图像

sense_info_list.en: an opinion; belief; or idea; or a way of thinking about something

examination_example.sentence: Our <highlight>view</highlight> is that if many people are living for longer, and are healthier for longer, then this will result in an inevitable redesign of work and life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的观点是，如果许多人都能活得更长久、更长久地保持更健康的状态，那么这将不可避免地导致工作和生活的重新规划。

examination_example.sentence: I lean toward the latter <highlight>view</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我倾向于后一种观点。

examination_example.sentence: What is the common <highlight>view</highlight> of mental function?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于心理功能的普遍观点是什么?

sense_info_list.en: have a particular opinion or way of thinking

examination_example.sentence: How people <highlight>viewed</highlight> success in his father's time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他父辈那个年代，人们如何看待成功。

examination_example.sentence: "People <highlight>view</highlight> economic success and wellbeing in life as a product of choice, willpower, and drive, " says Nat Kendall-Taylor, CEO of FrameWorks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: FrameWorks的首席执行官Nat Kendall-Taylor说：“人们将经济上的成功和幸福视为选择、意志力和动力的产物。”

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>view</highlight> this kind of advertising as environmental damage and will take strong action against it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将这种广告视为对环境的破坏，并将采取强有力的行动加以制止。

sense_info_list.zh: 看; 望; 观察; 察看

examination_example.sentence: Television <highlight>viewing</highlight> may be a potential factor for Alzheimer's disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看电视可能是阿尔茨海默病的一个潜在因素。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers say that television <highlight>viewing</highlight> may be a risk factor for Alzheimer's disease, but more research is needed to establish a link.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，看电视可能是导致阿尔茨海默病的一个危险因素，但需要更多的研究来确定两者之间的联系。

examination_example.sentence: What do the researchers say about their finding concerning the link between TV <highlight>viewing</highlight> and Alzheimer's disease?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于看电视和阿尔茨海默病之间的联系，研究人员对他们这个发现有什么看法？

sense_info_list.en: the visual appearance or an image of something when looked at in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: All of the factors external to a person's drive and choices that they've made become invisible and fade from <highlight>view</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个人的动力和其所做的选择之外的所有外部因素都变得不可见，并从视野中淡化。

sense_info_list.en: a sight or prospect; typically of attractive natural scenery; that can be taken in by the eye from a particular place
sense_info_list.zh: 景色; 风景; (尤指)乡间美景

examination_example.sentence: Some of the world's most innovative companies are located here, providing opportunities such as the one seized by a 12-year-old Mountain <highlight>View</highlight> resident.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些世界上最具创新精神的公司都坐落在这里，提供了很多机会，比如山景城一名12岁的居民就曾抓住过机会。

examination_example.sentence: Gazing down on the city from the Getty Center, an art museum in the Santa Monica Mountains, one would find the <highlight>view</highlight> of the Pacific Ocean blurred by the haze (霾) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从盖蒂中心(Getty Center)，圣塔莫尼卡山的一座美术馆眺望城市，人们会发现雾霾笼罩着太平洋。

examination_example.sentence: To this end, Aclima has been collaborating with Google's Street <highlight>View</highlight> system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为此，Aclima一直在与谷歌的街景系统合作。

sense_info_list.en: a particular way of considering or regarding something

examination_example.sentence: As Millennial women come of age they share many of the same <highlight>views</highlight> and values about work as their male counterparts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着千禧一代年轻女性逐渐成熟，她们对于工作的许多看法和价值观都与同龄男性相同。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 察看者；观看者；参观者；看片器；观众
n. 察看；观看；收看；亲眼目睹的机会

word_family.mean: n. 视力；视野；视线；看法；意见；想法；观点；视图；景色；图像

sense_info_list.en: have a particular opinion or way of thinking

examination_example.sentence: Generalists, on the other hand, know a lot about a wide range of subjects and <highlight>view</highlight> the whole with all its connections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，通才则对广泛的学科有很多了解，并通过所有的联系来观察整体。

examination_example.sentence: Silence may be <highlight>viewed</highlight> by some cultural groups as extremely uncomfortable; therefore attempts may be made to fill every gap (间隙) with conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某些文化群体看来，沉默可能会让人极不舒服；因此，可以尝试用对话来填补每一个间隙。

sense_info_list.en: the visual appearance or an image of something when looked at in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: Safety regulations-not to mention the modern sports fan's desire for a good <highlight>view</highlight> and a comfortable seat-tend to keep stadium capacities slightly lower.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安全规定——更不用说现代体育迷对良好视野和舒适座位的渴望——往往会让体育场的容量略微降低。

examination_example.sentence: The hotel has the best <highlight>views</highlight> of the Pacific Ocean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这家旅馆可以看到太平洋的最佳风景。

examination_example.sentence: I placed it centrally to take the <highlight>view</highlight> from the foreground right through into the forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我将它置于（镜头的）中央，以便取景时从前景直接穿入森林。

examination_example.sentence: They found that more on-demand entertainment <highlight>viewing</highlight> on tablets instead of TVs and desktop computers could cut energy consumption by 44%.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，用平板电脑而不是电视和台式电脑观看更多的点播娱乐节目可以减少44%的能源消耗。

sense_info_list.en: a sight or prospect, typically of attractive natural scenery, that can be taken in by the eye from a particular place

examination_example.sentence: Take a <highlight>view</highlight> is a desirable annual competition for photographers from all corners of the UK and beyond.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “取景”活动是来自英国各地甚至世界各地的摄影师每年都想参加的竞赛。

examination_example.sentence: I found myself completely above it and looking at a wonderfully clear <highlight>view</highlight> of Skiddaw with the sun setting in the west.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现自己完全位于雾气的上方，伴着夕阳西下，我看见了Skiddaw梦幻而清晰的景色。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>view</highlight> is especially evident on Kilimanjaro as climbers go through five ecosystems (生态系统) in the space of a few kilometers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种景象在乞力马扎罗山尤为明显，因为登山者要在几公里的空间内穿过五种生态系统。

examination_example.sentence: To voice his <highlight>views</highlight> on modern art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表达他对现代艺术的看法。

examination_example.sentence: That's my <highlight>view</highlight> on housework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是我有关家务的看法。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 视野, 视线, 视图

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I'd like a room with a lake <highlight>view</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想要一间能看到湖景的房间。

examination_example.sentence: You can enjoy beautiful <highlight>views</highlight> of the fields and woods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以欣赏田野和树林的美景。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>views</highlight> along the marathon route are beautiful．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沿着马拉松路线的风景很美。

examination_example.sentence: The New <highlight>View</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新的见解。

examination_example.sentence: She has a positive (积极的) <highlight>view</highlight> of life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她对生活有积极的看法。

examination_example.sentence: Let us know your <highlight>view</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们知道你的观点。

sense_info_list.zh: 视野, 视线, 视图

examination_example.sentence: Take a back <highlight>view</highlight> photo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拍一张后视图照片。

examination_example.sentence: People can also enjoy a 360-degree wide <highlight>view</highlight> of the activities online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们还可以在网上享受 360 度全方位的活动视图。

examination_example.sentence: It often stops the <highlight>view</highlight> of telescopes on Earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它经常阻止地球上望远镜的视野。

examination_example.sentence: People can choose wherever they like to <highlight>view</highlight> the activities at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们可以选择在家里的任何地方观看活动。

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>view</highlight> them offline, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您也可以离线查看它们。

examination_example.sentence: There is also an outdoor <highlight>viewing</highlight> platform (平台) where you can go outside to enjoy fresh air.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有一个户外观景台，你可以到外面去呼吸新鲜空气。
